Package org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan

Class OutputSlot<T>

java.lang.Object
org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.Slot<T>
org.apache.wayang.core.plan.wayangplan.OutputSlot<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OutputSlot<T> extends Slot<T>
An output slot declares an output of an Operator.
See Also:

    • followOutputRecursively

      public static <T> Collection<OutputSlot<T>> followOutputRecursively(OutputSlot<T> outputSlot)
      Recursively follow the given outputSlot.
      Parameters:
      outputSlot - the OutputSlot to follow
      Returns:
      the interfacing OutputSlots (either belong to a top-level Operator or occupy an InputSlot) that represent given outputSlot
      See Also:
      • Operator.getContainer()
      • OperatorContainer.followOutput(OutputSlot)

    • collectRelatedSlots

      public Set<OutputSlot<T>> collectRelatedSlots()
      Collects all OutputSlots that are related to this instance via OperatorContainers.
      Returns:
      all the matching OutputSlots

    • isFeedforward

      public boolean isFeedforward()
      Returns:
      whether this instance is designated to open feedback loops (i.e., data flow cycles)
